entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:45 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -18.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 08:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -18.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
